Document:
# Humans
At first glance, humans look quite unremarkable compared to everything else inside a average space station, but there's a reason they are the owners of the galaxy, as the first species capable of faster than light travel according to current records, humans have become accustomed to working in artifitial gravity enviroments, as well as having Endurance characteristics inherited from their ancestors in their home planet, turning a quite unassuming species into the main workforce of the BlueSpace age.
They sprint [color=#ffa500]about 12% longer[/color] compared to other species.
They interact [color=#ffa500]about 20% faster[/color] compared to other species.
Alongside Taking [color=#ffa500]around 20% longer[/color] to become [color=#fa0000]unconscious[/color].
